paramDescriptions.label: Enabled
paramDescriptions.description: Enable/disable the raycaster.

paramDescriptions.label: Cast Phase
paramDescriptions.description: Game loop phase to run casts.

paramDescriptions.label: Origin
paramDescriptions.description: Ray origin mode.

paramDescriptions.label: Local Offset [x,y,z]
paramDescriptions.description: Local-space offset when using object origin.

paramDescriptions.label: Max Distance
paramDescriptions.description: Maximum ray length.

paramDescriptions.label: Type
paramDescriptions.description: Raycast mode.

paramDescriptions.label: Rays (scatter/fan)
paramDescriptions.description: Number of rays for scatter/fan.

paramDescriptions.label: Cone Angle (scatter)
paramDescriptions.description: Full cone angle for scatter.

paramDescriptions.label: Fan Angle (fan)
paramDescriptions.description: Horizontal fan angle for fan mode.

paramDescriptions.label: Max Bounces
paramDescriptions.description: Maximum number of reflections for bounce mode.

paramDescriptions.label: Interval (s)
paramDescriptions.description: Fire no more often than every N seconds (0 = every frame).

paramDescriptions.label: Filter: Name Equals
paramDescriptions.description: Exact name match (case-sensitive).

paramDescriptions.label: Filter: Name Includes
paramDescriptions.description: Substring in object name (case-sensitive).

paramDescriptions.label: Filter: Has Component
paramDescriptions.description: Component name required on hit object (string or JSON array).

paramDescriptions.label: Filter: userData Match
paramDescriptions.description: Key/value pairs to match against object.userData.

paramDescriptions.label: Event: On Hit
paramDescriptions.description: Event name when any hit occurs.

paramDescriptions.label: Event: On Miss
paramDescriptions.description: Event name when no hit occurs.

paramDescriptions.label: Event: On Filtered Hit
paramDescriptions.description: Event name for hits passing filters.

paramDescriptions.label: Event: On Each Hit
paramDescriptions.description: Event name for each individual hit in multi-ray modes.

paramDescriptions.label: Include Object Ref
paramDescriptions.description: Include raw object reference in payload (use with care).
